Dear T
Thank you very much!Unfortunately the blade is very, very damaged=C2=
=A0Not worth even trying a polished, has the mark of generations of childre=
n have played with that sword...There came to my hands with the tsuba, one =
seppa, a habaki and the blade destroyed.Any other information that you coul=
d add?=C2=A0Then I will upload photos of what remains of that bladeThanks a=
nd regards from Argentina 

     El Mi=C3=A9rcoles, 22 de octubre, 2014 18:=
57:38, "junkmail@... [nihontostudy]" <nihontostudy@...=
m> escribi=C3=B3:
   

  =C2=A0   Eduardo -=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0The insc=
ription reads "Tamba no Kami Yoshimichi" and it looks to be a well cut mei.=
 Not to say that it=C2=A0is genuine, we really would have to see some photo=
s of the blade but first impression looks pretty good.-t=C2=A0=C2=A0
